sentence.Network_en: Bark brown, flake off Schnabelia branchlet, sprig flower clustered on the top.
sentence.Network_cn: 树皮褐色, 片状剥落小枝四棱,花簇生于小枝顶端.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 小枝(Branchlet) 自枝条再分枝而生的较细枝条 2.茎的质地:草质(Herbaceous) 无明显木质化的茎,富含纤维且质地柔软浆质(Succulent) 多肉且含大量水分的茎.

list.abs: first-year branchlets yellow . winter buds globose . leaf scars obscurely protruding on branchlets . apex of seed scales obtuse-rounded .第一年小枝黄。冬芽球状。叶痕不明显在小枝上突出。种子先端鳞片钝圆形。
year branchlets terete ; terminal buds puberulent ., 当年小枝圆柱状 ; 顶芽被微柔毛.
young branchlets and inflorescences thinly villous , rarely subglabrous .稀疏的幼枝和花序具长柔毛，很少近无毛。
branchlet internodes short , with scattered grayish white bristles .小枝节间短，带有散布的浅灰色的白色刚毛。

means.word_mean: 1. small branch or division of a branch; usually applied to branches of the current or preceding year
